name: s3-zip-archiver
description: Read and upload a zip archive of s3 files to s3 using streams

scripts.build: npm run types:emit && npm run bundle:cjs && npm run bundle:esm
scripts.bundle:cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs || true && mkdir -p dist/cjs && esbuild --platform=node index.js utils.js --target=node18 --format=cjs --outdir=dist/cjs
scripts.bundle:esm: rm -rf dist/esm || true && mkdir -p dist/esm && esbuild --platform=node index.js utils.js --target=node18 --format=esm --outdir=dist/esm
scripts.precommit: lint-staged && npm run build && git add dist/.
